description: This file defines a Flask Blueprint and a class-based view for a health check endpoint in a web application.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView that handles GET requests for health checking.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Returns a JSON message indicating the server is healthy.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests in the HealthCheck class-based view.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
